name: Opennode-management
body:
### Welcome to OpenNode Management Service Core

OMS core is a modular container built primarily for hosting the OMS Knot cloud management platform,
available at http://opennode.github.com/opennode-knot.

### Quick Installation ###

```
$ curl -s http://opennodecloud.com/download/oms-core-installer.sh | sh
```

Further documentation available at: http://opennodecloud.com/docs/opennode.oms.core/
